TopicTitle: How Much Time Have You Spent Playing KSP?

Articles.Content: 236 hours on steam, and at about 300 more on modded installs I didn't start through steam.
Honestly I don't know. I don't run KSP via Steam, and my account there only says 24 hours - which is somewhat off. My best estimate would be around 500 hours, but really, I don't know.
Around 350 hours, I have very little time to play video games, only Minecraft clocks more (around 500)
On my off days I can spend 18-20 hours a day on KSP usually spending about a week on each design
1000+ hours on steam.

1036 hours per Steam. I had it for 3 months before it went on Steam, and I played the 0.13 demo over a hundred hours.

I AM NOT AN ADDICT. By the way, I just looked outside, when did Spring happen?
Steam says slightly under 600 but that's the vanilla installation which I copy to other locations for modding.
1200 hours since april last year.

3k or 4k may be 5k probably more i usually doesn't count over 1k or 2k spent on a single game ...

( {[me]} /played Ã¢â€°Ë† >> 1 321 920 000s ... oh yeah nevermind ... )

Edited May 20, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
(Over GameS indeed xDr)
I'd estimate 600+ hours
I don't have Steam to count for me, but I'm confident I'm in the well-over-1000 crowd by this point.
535 hours on Steam, probably 400 Ã‚Â±100 hrs before the transfer.

According to Steam, I'm somewhere in the 800-hour range.

Right now, however, a lot of hours are going to GTA 5...
550 hrs on steam, 1000+ hrs off.
Steam says 606 hours, but could be more because I still play the game but I have it pinned to my Desktop bar. So I open the game but not through Steam.

High 2000 hours, tbh, pretty burned out and just waiting for a mod update to attempt rebuilding everything for the 7341th time saiLewd

I did have a blast though right when 1.0 hit with figuring out the broken heat system and cheat it, till 1.0.1 hit and went "ugh" seeing more facepalm bugs while modding... seriously Squad, atleast release an emergency 1.0.3 patch to fix the freaking heat gauge memory leak, or turn it off by default instead of on.

2200h after I converted to Steam. Played it since first public version.

Pretty often it's just running while I'm away disciplining the kids.
Steam says 493 as I am starting it up this evening.
Guestimating 600-700 hours.
Currently I have 463 hours played.
Just about 500 hours. really 500 hours and i feel like i just started to get to know this game well
469 hours on steam.
Only about 177 hours. Not as much as many others.
More than 1.500 hours. KSP instantly made it to place 3 of my alltime favorites. And i still play...
281 hours on steam. If i could play more i would be very happy, but unfortunately i have to learn
